Byyhi kvr aashi ʿṭa lqman ʿlyh alslams gatth jar, suh gvv ʿlm v ʿml, tvpth frmvvus aashi kh shukr daph khdays tihnzn nʿmczn petth khṣvṣaan ḥkmts petth yosh bdd nʿmt chhe kyazi yus khdae snz shkrguzạry chhu kran ts chhu tamuyk fạydh pnnis pans yʿny nʿmts andr zyadty spdnụ̄ yus kfrani nʿmt chhu kran suh chhu pnnue nqṣan kran. Byyhi kvr aashi tạkydy ḥkm ansans mạlis majhi hndi ḥqh kh prth ḥals andr gczihh tihund adb th rʿāyt mlḥvẓ thavun. Mvj chhas kochhhi mnz travan th mvl chhus tulan, mvl chhus travan th mvj chhas tulan, yim doshve chhis lolh mth lae kran. Aamy mokhh kvr aashi pnnyn ḥqvqn sintụ̄ mạlis majhi hundḥq adakrnuk ḥkm amis ansans petth, me frmvv amis ansans kh kr czh shkrguzạry, aakh myạnụ̄ byyhi krụ̄ zi shkrgzạry pnnis mạlis majhi hnz. Allah tʿālyā snz shkr guzạry gyhi ʿbadt v aṭaʿt sintụ̄, mạlis majhi hnz shkrguzạry gyhi khdmt sintụ̄ byyhi tihindụ̄ ḥqvq ada krnh sintụ̄, ptvlakh chhuv mee nishhi vatun, tamhi saʿth yuth vvv mut āsyth tiyuth lonkh bavjvd aynkh mạlis majhi hund ḥq chhu setthah bvdd mgr tvḥyduk mslh chhuv tiyuth ʿẓym alshan kh

Hrgah tim doshve ya timav andrh aakh mjbvr krne me shryk tthhravns petth suh chyz yymich nh the khbre āsy so kth mạnụ̄ zynh czh kynhh hrgz, yhi kth chhe ẓrvry kh dnyakyn ẓrvryatn andr rvuzụ̄zi cz timn sintụ̄ rthi ṭryqh. Lhādha mh kriv tvhụ̄ myạnis kunhi ḥkms khlaf aamhi pth chhi byan kran, byyhi lqman ḥkmcz yʿny lqman ṣạbn frmvv pnnis frznds.

Ae myanhi frndh Allah tʿālyā sund ʿlm th qdrt chhu tyvut kh agr kạnshi hnz ʿml āshi āsrụ̄ dans brabr mqdarh kinụ̄, soe āshi kunhi brris pls mnz khttith thavnh āmcz nath āshi āsmann andr lvukn nishhi dvur kunhi jayhi, ya āshi zmyns mnz tl patal yvt nh kanhh vạtith hykhi mgr khdae sundd shan chhu kh yimav sarive pvushydh jayv mnz krrith aanhi suh qyamt kh doh ḥsab kh vqth. ʿmln mtʿlq frmạvns yhi nṣyḥt kh ae myanhi frzndh nemaz thavbrpa, nemaz chhe aʿlyā drjich ʿml byyhi ās rczn kamyn hund aamr kran byyn lvukn th byyhi ās ychh kamyv nishhi lvukn mnʿ kran, aath mnz yus tklyfah th mṣybtah vạty, prth mṣybts petth ās ṣbr kran, pzipạtthụ̄ yhi ṣbr krun chhu hmt chv kamyv andrh.

Akhlaq v ʿādatn andr frmvvts, byyhi mh ās lvukn nishhi buth panun phiran tkbr sbbh, byyhi mh ās zmynhi petth pkan ddalh maran tmhi ghrvrv tkbrsan kyazi, be shk Allah tʿālyā chhunh psnd kran kạnshi mghrvrs yus thykan āshi.

Byyhi ās myanh rvy kran pnnis pkns andr th mh ās dvr tulith pkan, thi chhu aakh vqars khlaf byyhi chhi tth andr db lgnuk khṭrh, nh mh ās tvulụ̄ tvulụ̄ pkan, yhi chhe mtkbrn hnz chal, byyhi kr pst āvaz pnnụ̄, krykh mh ās lgan.
